name: Homeowner Emergency Loan Program (HELP)
description: MOHCD provides loans to San Franciscan homeowners who need financial emergency help with the following: - Late mortgage payments (money owed for your house) - Late HOA (Homeowners Association) fees (money owed to your neighborhood group) - Late property taxes (money owed to the government) - Special assessments (extra costs, like fixing things in homes) - Repairs for BMR (Below Market Rate) homes so they can be sold. BMR homes are sold at lower prices to help people afford houses.
